cards.name: Pokémon Retriever
text: Search your discard pile for Basic Pokémon and Evolution cards. You may either show 1 Basic Pokémon or Evolution card to your opponent and put it into your hand, or show a combination of 3 Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards to your opponent and shuffle them into your deck.

cards.name: Rocket's Tricky Gym
text: Each Pokémon with Dark or Rocket's in its name (both yours and your opponent's) can use attacks on this card instead of its own.
This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play.

attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

ability.name: Darkness Veil
ability.text: As long as Rocket's Articuno ex has any Darkness Energy attached to it prevent all effects except damage by an opponent's attack done to Rocket's Articuno ex."

attacks.name: Freeze Solid
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a Water Energy card and attach it to Rocket's Articuno ex."

ability.name: Strikes Back
ability.text: If Rocket's Hitmonchan ex is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Rocket's Hitmonchan ex is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mach Punch
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Darkness Switch
attacks.text: Discard an Energy card attached to Rocket's Mewtwo ex, and then switch all damage counters on Rocket's Mewtwo ex with those on the Defending Pokémon. (If an effect of this attack is prevented, this attack does nothing.)

attacks.name: Hypnoblast
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

ability.name: Dark Lift
ability.text: If Rocket's Moltres ex has any Darkness Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost for Rocket's Moltres ex is 0."

attacks.name: Fire Dance
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon."

ability.name: Dual Armor
ability.text: As long as Rocket's Scyther ex has any Grass Energy attached to it, Rocket's Scyther ex is both Grass and Darkness type."

attacks.name: Bounce
attacks.text: After your attack, you may switch Rocket's Scyther ex with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Slashing Strike
attacks.text: Rocket's Scyther ex can't use Slashing Strike during your next turn.

ability.name: Dark Healer
ability.text: As long as Rocket's Snorlax ex has any Darkness Energy attached to it, remove 1 damage counter from Rocket's Snorlax ex between turns."

attacks.name: Poison Claws
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Collapse
attacks.text: Rocket's Snorlax ex is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Whirlpool
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spring Back
attacks.text: If your opponent has only 1 Prize card left, this attack does 20 damage plus 50 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
